author: Roger Culberson
comment: The watchface is working now. But I still haven't been able to summon Shenron. Fix that for 5 stars.

reply.author: Reality Labs
reply.content:
This is because you didn’t say the correct phrase to invoke it, try using "Rise Shenron" and tell us if work for you.  :) XD
Now seriously, thanks for your review, we will continue working to improve this and other faces much more.

reply.content: Please download the new version with this characteristics.
